title: Looking for an Old Judge of Bierbauer
author: Brian Van Horn

posts.post_title: Looking for an Old Judge of Bierbauer
posts.post_content: Please no skinned or trimmed cards.

Brian--I have a beautiful SGC70 (great photo) available for $450 plus shipping. If you are interested send me an email at [url]oldjudge@gmail.com[/url] and I'll send a scan.

Best--Jay
